heading.content: Managing foreign exchange risk made easy and cost effective for SMEs

subHeading.content: We believe that foreign exchange risk management, which involves hedging a firm's foreign currency cash flows or balance sheet positions, must be made a simpler, more transparent and cost-effective proposition for all Corporates - specifically for those small and mid-sized firms for which elaborate Treasury Management Solutions are too expensive, resource-intensive, complex to implement or onerous to manage.

buttons.label: Learn more
content: Managing foreign exchange risks can be complex and expensive despite the provision of foreign exchange products and services by numerous banks and brokers. The reason for this is largely down to lack of focus on FX risk management and a transaction driven approach taken by providers of such products and services. This often leads to an increase in traded FX volumes, and profitability of the provider banks and brokers rather than the effective FX risk management of their customers.

We aim to make it easy, simple and cost effective for you to manage foreign exchange risk whilst remaining focused on your core business. In our full-service technology driven web-portal, you can use our robust proprietary platform, FX risk management tools and institutional quality liquidity to manage foreign exchange risk in your business while reducing transactional costs through our unique ‘industry first’ subscription-based service.

Easy and intuitive tools such as ‘Risk Insight’, ‘FX Calculator’, ‘Risk        Radar’, ‘Risk Impact’, and ‘Risk Alert’ help you identify, assess the impact of foreign exchange fluctuation on your bottom line; as well as the mitigating impact of hedging, on your assessed risk.
These also help you monitor the FX risks in your business in real time so that timely action can be taken to manage the risk effectively.

Market Intelligence is a key tool to monitor the FX market which helps in decision making on assessing and hedging FX exposure, benchmarking the hedges, and getting the required FX data for accounting and other reporting purposes.
subHeading.moreContent: Caution: FXGuard limited provides the platform, tools and execution services; however, it does not provide advice on suitability, requirement, proportion or decision by a firm to hedge its business. Hedging may or may not be appropriate for your firm and you should rely on your own decision-making in this regard, or seek professional advice, if necessary.

content: FX Spot and Forward: Most Corporates can manage their foreign exchange risks by using vanilla FX Spot and Forward products. Our platform facilitates simple trade execution, whilst offering transparent and competitive prices to our customers.

Payments: Towards risk management execution and settlement, a firm may need to make payments to its associates, subsidiaries or third-parties. Our platform can facilitate payments in an easy, secure and cost-effective manner.

heading.content: The Digital Foreign Exchange Risk Manager

subHeading.content: We have deployed our expertise and in-depth understanding of the drivers and dynamics of foreign exchange risk management through tools and analytics such as FX calculators, FX data analytics, plus other features and support put at your disposal on an ongoing basis.

No more lack of clarity and transparency about where you can get the best FX prices. Opt for our easy subscription services and always get the institutional rates that we receive and pass on without any added mark-up. For FX Forwards, when dealing without margins (collateral), pay a transparent mark-up based on your profile and requirements.

heading.content: Manage your FX Risks by using our simple, intuitive, and effective Risk Management Solution

subHeading.content: We believe that customers should have access to simple, intuitive and cost-effective insight and tools to enable them to manage their FX exposures themselves. Most SME customers and some large customers too do not need to spend in expensive treasury staff and expensive systems to enable them to protect their bottom line from FX movements. The digital technology and proprietary robust tools developed by us will enhance your foreign exchange risk management  and save you substantial costs.
